data.text: “Ai ādamzād, angūr kī bel kī lakaṛī kis lihāz se jangal kī dīgar lakaṛiyoṅ se behtar hai?
Kyā yih kisī kām ā jātī hai? Kyā yih kam az kam khūṅṭiyāṅ banāne ke lie istemāl ho saktī hai jin se chīzeṅ laṭkāī jā sakeṅ? Hargiz nahīṅ!
Use īṅdhan ke taur par āg meṅ phaiṅkā jātā hai. Is ke bād jab us ke donoṅ sire bhasm hue haiṅ aur bīch meṅ bhī āg lag gaī hai to kyā wuh kisī kām ā jātī hai?
Āg lagne se pahle bhī bekār thī, to ab wuh kis kām āegī jab us ke donoṅ sire bhasm hue haiṅ balki bīch meṅ bhī āg lag gaī hai?
Rab Qādir-e-mutlaq farmātā hai ki Yarūshalam ke bāshinde angūr kī bel kī lakaṛī jaise haiṅ jinheṅ maiṅ jangal ke daraḳhtoṅ ke darmiyān se nikāl kar āg meṅ phaiṅk detā hūṅ.
Kyoṅki maiṅ un ke ḳhilāf uṭh khaṛā hūṅgā. Go wuh āg se bach nikle haiṅ to bhī āḳhirkār āg hī unheṅ bhasm karegī. Jab maiṅ un ke ḳhilāf uṭh khaṛā hūṅgā to tum jān loge ki maiṅ hī Rab hūṅ.
Pūre mulk ko maiṅ wīrān-o-sunsān kar dūṅgā, is lie ki wuh bewafā sābit hue haiṅ. Yih Rab Qādir-e-mutlaq kā farmān hai.”
